channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Shopp
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Shopp

item.title: CVE-2021-24493|2024-08-03T19:35:20.019Z -- unknown -- shopp
item.description: The shopp_upload_file AJAX action of the Shopp WordPress plugin through 1.4, available to both unauthenticated and authenticated user does not have any security measure in place to prevent upload of malicious files, such as PHP, allowing unauthenticated users to upload arbitrary files and leading to RCE
